resources.string: This is a demo showing the usage of the Lightstreamer Android client library in order to receive real-time updates and push notifications.
Use the start/pause button on the menu to open/close the connection to the Lightstreamer server.
Touch one of the stocks in the list to see its details.
From the details page you can activate/deactivate push notifications, to be received on price changes, by enabling/disabling the toggle on the bottom.

You can also set a threshold by touching the stock chart: if the price passes the threshold, the device will receive a push notification. A green line indicates that the threshold is being set while the red line represent the currently set threshold. Once fired the threshold will be deactivated.
Navigate the sources of the demo application on github github.com/Weswit/Lightstreamer-example-MPNStockList-client-android and check out our website www.lightstreamer.com
Live charts are plotted using androidplot androidplot.com
